short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your daily medication/supplement with VitaTrack

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing VitaTrack, the ultimate Chrome extension to effortlessly manage your medications, vitamins, and supplements! Say goodbye to missed doses and complicated schedules—VitaTrack helps you stay on top of your health routine with ease and convenience.

With VitaTrack, you can:

● Add any medication, supplement, or vitamin you're taking, and easily set custom frequency times for each one. Whether you need a daily, weekly, or custom reminder, VitaTrack will keep you on track.
● Track your progress by automatically logging the number of times you've taken each item, helping you stay informed and motivated.
● Personalize your experience with random color assignments for each medication, making it simple to distinguish between your different health essentials at a glance.
● Choose your interface with both dark mode and light mode options to suit your visual preferences and reduce eye strain.
● VitaTrack makes managing your health routine a breeze, ensuring you never forget a dose again, all while keeping everything neat, organized, and visually appealing. Get started today and take control of your wellness with just a few clicks!
